meta_title: Mahindra Manulife Short Duration Fund Direct   Growth - Groww
meta_desc: Mahindra Manulife Short Duration Fund Direct   Growth is Short Duration Debt mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 3/10. It has track record of 3 years, with three year return of 6.18. Risk is Moderate
scheme_name: Mahindra Manulife Short Duration Fund Direct   Growth
description: The scheme seeks to generate income and capital appreciation through an actively managed diversified portfolio of Debt & Money Market instruments such that the Macaulay duration of the portfolio is between 1 year to 3 years.
benchmark_name: CRISIL Short Duration Debt B-II Index

analysis.analysis_desc:
Average credit rating of the fund's holdings: AAA 
This fund has holdings of the highest quality
Consistently higher annualised returns than category average for the past 1Y and 3Y

Higher alpha: 4.53 
The fund has generated returns higher than benchmark - CRISIL Short Duration Debt B-II Index - in the last 3Y

amc_info.name: Mahindra Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: 1st Floor, Sadhana House, Behind Mahindra Tower, 570 P. B. Marg, Worli, Mumbai 400018
amc_info.description: Mahindra Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on  04/02/2016 and its managing total assets of â‚¹2,241 Cr. Its ranked at 31 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
Mahindra is one of the leading brands in the country and has garnered trust of customers across the nation. Mahindra Asset Management Company Private Limited is a wholly owned subsidiary of Mahindra and Mahindra Financial Services Limited (MMFSL).

Mahindra provides various schemes across different market capitalization in various categories. It focuses mainly in the rural and semi-urban areas. The fact that Mahindra concentrates more on financially empowering masses in the rural area, makes it stand out in the mutual fund industry and it aspires to become the best financial service provider to people who live in semi-urban and rural areas.

The motto of the company is therefore unique because it not only wants to revolutionize the financial industry, it also aims at building a change within the community, by helping investors who do not hail from an urban set-up.

category_info.tax_impact: Returns are taxed as per your Income Tax slab.
category_info.description: Invest predominantly in Government Securities(minimum 80% of total assets). They are relatively more risky than the other debt funds due to fluctuating interest rates.

fund_manager_details.experience: Prior to joining Mahindra Manulife Mutual Fund, he has worked with Taurus AMC, Sundaram Mutual Fund and IDBI Mutual Fund.
